In the first episode Simon explores the early years of the country, when Iberia was a minor province of Carthage - then the most coveted of Romeâ€™s colonies - through to the glories of Spain's Moslem age and the CÃ³rdoba Caliphate.

Simon travels to Cadiz with Spainâ€™s first invaders and visits a sacred island where the Carthaginian warrior Hannibal received the blessing of the Gods. We learn how early Spain was a battleground for empires and visit Italica - a perfectly preserved Roman city with one of the finest amphitheatres outside Rome. From there this episode covers the early, brazen Christian Martyrs; the Visigoths and the Moslem conquest.
